name: Hospiral: Nursing Loop
description:
Hello yet again!

This is my entry for Mini Jam 128: Health

Hospiral: Nursing Loop is a simulation/puzzle game about a neverending looping hospital. Climb your way and loop between the floors to grab the correct items and cure the patients!

Grab syringes, stall their demise through painkillers, and even combine medicines in order to fight different diseases!

How to Play

Move around and find out what each object can be used for. By getting close to an object, it will glow in a blue outline if it is interactable. Ambulances are always coming with patients, you need to check their thought bubble to see what kind of diseases they have, and then find the medicine for it in time.

Patients are constantly losing health, so help them with painkillers and heal them quickly!

There are multiple ranks to each level, S being the perfect score, F being the worst (non-gameover). 

Controls (just pick whichever you prefer, the game detects automatically):
  • Scheme 1: The Keyboard & Mouser
    • WASD - Move
    • Left Click - Jump
    • Right Click - Interact
  • Scheme 2: Pico-8 like style
    • Up,Down,Left,Right - Move
    • Z - Jump
    • X - Interact
  • Scheme 3: I dunno?
    • WASD - Move
    • E - Interact
    • W - Jump
  • Scheme 4: Controller
    • D-PAD / Left Analog Stick: Move
    • South Button: Jump
    • West/East Buttons: Interact
Credits
